name: the Auctioneer
description: A fast-talking man with a polished wooden gavel. He constantly scans the room, looking for the slight twitch of a finger that indicates a bid.
ambient_messages: polishes his gavel with a silk handkerchief.
shouts, 'Sold! To the lady in the back!'

name: the Postmaster
description: A harried-looking gnome wearing a visor. He stamps letters with furious efficiency, barely looking up.
ambient_messages: mutters, 'Neither rain nor snow... but they didn't mention dragons...'
sorts a stack of letters with blurring speed.

name: the Vault Clerk
description: A severe-looking woman with a large ring of heavy iron keys attached to her belt. She eyes you suspiciously.
ambient_messages: glances at the iron lockers to ensure they are secure.
